content.html: some people can't multitask. i can't multitask. a 1-hour meeting of which 10% is relevant to me means you took 54 minutes of my focused, undivided attention tossed it in the trash. it's exhausting, and demotivating, and there's no making up for it. please make it an e-mail.
content.value:
some people can't multitask. i can't multitask.

a 1-hour meeting of which 10% is relevant to me means you took 54 minutes of my focused, undivided attention tossed it in the trash. it's exhausting, and demotivating, and there's no making up for it.

please make it an e-mail.
